name: SnapNutrient - Your personalzied nutrition tracking platform
description: Launched an AI-powered meal tracking platform using Next.js and TypeScript secured via Google OAuth2, enabling users to log meals via photo, receive personalized nutrition analysis, and interact socially through likes and comments.

name: Robotics for Space Exploration - CIRC Competition 2022
description: Configured GPS, Lidar, and IMU sensors with ROS(C++) on Ubuntu to stream real-time data and generate terrain maps; Competed in the Canadian International Rover Challenge (CIRC)!

name: Ultimate Fan Trip Routing Optimizer
description: Integrated schedule data from major professional leagues and the Google Maps API, derived linear programming formulation, and implemented a solver to optimize trips for following a team to all away opponents.

name: Rate My Professors (RMP) Sentiment Analysis
description: Scraped data of 3500 professors from RMP using selenium and beautifulsoup. Optimized and benchmarked seven models and three text encodings for sentiment analysis task. Achieved >0.80 precision and recall.

name: Royal Game of Ur Optimizer
description: Built tournament-style evaluation CLI for game-playing agents. Implemented asynchronous dynamic programming value iteration in Rust to calculate the optimal strategy for an ancient board game.
